0.1.name: wordpress/instruct
0.1.description:
Instruct allows Wordpress bloggers to add step-by-step instructions to their site. No longer will you have to fumble with tables and layout issues. Instructions can be quickly created and linked to corresponding images. Everything from recipes to technical tutorials; this plugin makes it easier.

Simplify:

  • Online product manuals
  • Driving directions
  • Recipes
  • Technical tutorials
  • Installation instructions

Build tutorials, share knowledge and keep traffic at your blog.

This plug-in was forged deep in the fires of Think Bowl
